diff_act: 1.Provide regular data backups to prevent loss of information.
2.Back up all critical data on a daily basis.
3.Make backed up data accessible for recovery within the shortest possible timeframe.
4.Notify the System Administrator via email when multiple failed login attempts are detected from the same user account.
5.Enable the administrator to take necessary actions to secure the account.
6.prevent unauthorized access to enhance the security of user data and overall system integrity
7.Authenticate and validate users before they are permitted to access the system and perform any operations.

regen.absent_element: email alert to the System Administrator for multiple failed login attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the System Administrator via email when multiple failed login attempts are detected from the same user account.

regen.absent_element: action for securing the account after multiple failed login attempts
regen.new_specification: Enable the System Administrator to take necessary actions to secure the account after multiple failed login attempts.

regen.absent_element: guidance for System Administrator post alert of multiple failed logins
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide mechanisms for the System Administrator to secure affected accounts after receiving alerts for multiple failed login attempts.

label: These warnings are sent to the System Administrator.
absence: action of sending warnings for failed login
